text: Lycée Galilée is a senior high school/sixth-form college in Cergy, Val-d'Oise, France, in the Paris metropolitan area. It is within the Cergy-Saint- Christophe area of the commune."Lycées ." Magny-en-Vexin. Retrieved on September 6, 2016. it had 1,200 students. It has English and German-based European sections."Le lycée Galilée en quelques mots." Lycée Galilée. title: Lycée Galilée (Cergy)
